name: Reincarnated in a stone in a different world, I want to protect the girl, so I will be strong
name_original: Reincarnated in a stone in a different world, I want to protect the girl, so I will be strong
description:
*All characters in this game are 18 or older.

■Plot■

The main character wakes up one day in another world, reincarnated as a stone.

There, he meets a magician named Anna, the Queen of Femt Kingdom.
He then joins her on her quest.

Embark on a great journey with Anna, her maids, and many other NPCs.

What awaits them on the path ahead?

Only one way to find out!


■System Overview■

-High quality pixelated monsters
-Plenty of side-quests
-Rich character movement
-Small talk between characters, Party chat system
-Messages can be skipped
-Orthodox turn-based RPG combat
-Infinite sprint
-Losing to certain enemies may trigger special events...
-Interacting with the sub-heroine may trigger some naughty events...
